## Document.getPresence() method

`getPresence` returns the presence of the given clientID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPresence(clientID: ActorID): P | undefined;
```

|  clientID | [ActorID](./yorkie-js-sdk.actorid.md) |  |
